name: git_branching_merging
description: Create, switch, merge, and manage Git branches

args: cd /tmp/test-repo && git branch feature-1 && git branch feature-2 && git branch --list
cd /tmp/test-repo && git switch feature-1 && echo 'Feature code' > feature.txt && git add feature.txt && git commit -m 'Add feature' && git log --oneline --graph

expected_output.example:
Switched to branch 'feature-1'
* def456 Add feature
* abc123 Initial commit

args: cd /tmp/test-repo && git switch main && git merge feature-1 --no-edit && git log --oneline --all --graph
